General.Name: Zhang Jia Jie Tourism Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhang Jia Jie Tourism Group Co., Ltd. engages in the operation of tourist attractions, travel agency, tourist passenger cableway, and hotels businesses in China. It also provides tourist passenger transport and house leasing services. The company was formerly known as Zhang Jia Jie Tourism Development Co., Ltd. Zhang Jia Jie Tourism Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Zhangjiajie, China.
